price: 24. Cuna oo cabba idinkoo faraxsan, waa waxaad horay u falateen maalmihii tegaye.
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَآ أَسۡلَفۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَيَّامِ ٱلۡخَالِيَةِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā aslaftum fī al-ayāmi al-khāliyati
